She doesn't finish talking but you can tell she's thinking about it deeper.

Suddenly, she pushes the keyboard away to her side, leans over closer to you and speaks in a lower tone.

"So, there is this job that nobody wants.. actually I'm not even sure I should try to recommend it to people anymore, but we still have the equipment here so..."

You near her too.

"It makes matter smaller. Like.. diminishes the size, you know.. it basically..."

Your open mouth suggests her at least how surprised your are, and she prepares to receive another formal complaint, but you let her continue.

"Y..Yes, it can supposedly shrink.. humans. We.. huh.. were asked to find a volunteer to prove or disprove it but.. even among us, even with the large bonus for the applicant, nobody wanted to give it a try."

The moment of choice has arrived, this is where you get harder while writing your stories and you know it's safe to merely write about it. Honestly, would you REALLY go for this shit? Getting a girl you barely know zap you with some, supposedly, Shrinkomatic 2000? And even if you could really trust her, what if something went wrong and you couldn't go back to your normal sized life every again? Becoming someone's custody, pet, slave or experiment in a freaking cage?
This is why you should never trust technology unless you made it yourself, and could keep working on it after an accident.

But.. this is a story. Jasmine as a giantess.. well, none of us macrophiles would say no to that chance, even for just a minute in our lives, so...

The woman's eyes go wide for a moment after she's stopped talking. Your eyes catch a glimpse of that beautiful open mouth and, imagining your tiny and frail body in there, trapped between her lips holding you naked, you confirm to yourself you really want to do this. There's obviously no guarantee she'll put you in her mouth (what for?) or even that you'll actually shrink, but you have to give this a shot. "I'm sure, Jasmine.. but well.."

"..Yes? What is it?"

You think this through as best as you can do given only seconds to think of more convenient conditions.

"I agree to do this only if it is just with you. I don't want anyone else there when... if I actually shrink. I want to know that I can trust you and.. how small do you think I'll be anyway?"

"I.. I..." she scratches the side of her mouth with a nail "..around.. probably two... three inches, more or less... but it could differ, it is still experimental after all.."

You chuckle.

"Three inches tall? You could carry me in your pocket at that size.."

She suddenly gets rosier cheeks. Blushing? What for? "Well.. I'm sure you wouldn't want me to... and anyway... yes. You can trust me. If you agree, it will be only the two of us in the room. Actually, we could even wait for everybody else to leave, or..."

"Or...?" you raise an eyebrow.
